title: Week Two Start or Sit (09/18 Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Bucs offense, Alvin Kamara, Allen Lazard, Gabe Davis, Michael Pittman, D'Andre Swift, J.K. Dobbins and more!
You can also follow the full-length Fantasy Football Today podcast here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/fantasy-football-today-podcast/id261735167
